biotools.summary:
Accurate characterization of expanded tandem repeat length and sequence through whole genome long-read sequencing on PromethION.

Dynamic time warping of Oxford Nanopore squiggle data to characterize tandem repeats.

Several tools exist to analyze tandem repeats (e.g. tandem-genotypes and RepeatHMM)

bioschemas.name: NanoSatellite
